client_number.label: Client Number
client_number.comment: The default client number is only for test purposes, for production purposes use your credentials

username.label: Username
username.comment: The default username is only for test purposes, for production purposes use your credentials

password.label: Password
password.comment: The default password is only for test purposes, for production purposes use your credentials

autocreate_shipping_on_shipment_create.label: Autocreate Shipping after Shipment create (from Admin)

storepickup_cron.label: Time to update Andreani Shipment Statuses

allow_free_shipping_promotions.label: Free Shipping Promotions
allow_free_shipping_promotions.comment: Allow free shipping promotions to apply to matrixrate

show_only_free.label: Only Display Free Shipping
show_only_free.comment: If free shipping applies dont show other shipping rates

include_free_ship_items.label: Include Free Shipping Items in Rate Calculation
include_free_ship_items.comment: Include weight, qty of Free Shipping Products in calculation of shipping rates

include_virtual_price.label: Include Virtual Products in Rate Calculation
include_virtual_price.comment: Include price, qty of Virtual Products in calculation of shipping rates

condition_name.label: Condition to match on Matrix Rates
condition_name.comment: Filter prices based on destination AND weight, price or quantity

conditionable_filters.label: Fields that will be used to filter scope of results on matrixrates
conditionable_filters.comment: Filter prices based on country AND/OR region AND/OR city AND/OR postal code

gateway_url.label: Gateway URL
gateway_url.comment: The default gateway is only for test purposes, for production purposes use https://www.e-andreani.com/CASAWS/eCommerce/ImposicionRemota.svc?wsdl

gateway_tracking_url.label: Gateway Tracking URL
gateway_tracking_url.comment: The default gateway is only for test purposes, for production purposes use https://www.e-andreani.com/eAndreaniWS/Service.svc?wsdl

gateway_storepickup_url.label: Gateway Storepickup URL
gateway_storepickup_url.comment: The default gateway is only for test purposes, for production purposes use https://www.e-andreani.com/CASAWS/eCommerce/ConsultaSucursales.svc?wsdl

gateway_rates_url.label: Gateway Rates URL
gateway_rates_url.comment: The default gateway is only for test purposes, for production purposes use https://www.e-andreani.com/CASAWS/eCommerce/CotizacionEnvio.svc?wsdl

apply_insurance_on_shipping_price.label: Apply Insurance over shipping Price
apply_insurance_on_shipping_price.comment: If it's not, then Insurance will be showed like subtotal

attribute_weight.label: Product Attribute Weight for Andreani
attribute_weight.comment: This setting is used to get weight of products when Magento generate request to andreani

attribute_height.label: Product Attribute Height for Andreani
attribute_height.comment: This setting is used to get Height of products when Magento generate request to andreani

attribute_width.label: Product Attribute Width for Andreani
attribute_width.comment: This setting is used to get Width of products when Magento generate request to andreani

attribute_length.label: Product Attribute Length for Andreani
attribute_length.comment: This setting is used to get Length of products when Magento generate request to andreani

client_number.label: Client Number
client_number.comment: The default client number is only for test purposes, for production purposes use your credentials

username.label: Username
username.comment: The default username is only for test purposes, for production purposes use your credentials

password.label: Password
password.comment: The default password is only for test purposes, for production purposes use your credentials

contract.label: Contract
contract.comment: The default contract is only for test purposes, for production purposes use your credentials

debug_mode.label: Debugging Enabled
debug_mode.comment: This debugging mode should be enabled only for test environments

shipping_type_for_matrixrates.label: Shipping Type for Matrix Rates
shipping_type_for_matrixrates.comment: This string must match with "delivery_type" column of Matrix Rates CSV

postal_codes_disabled.label: Postal Codes Disabled
postal_codes_disabled.comment: Fill this input with postal codes to disable new branches by default. To use more than one postal code connect them with a comma. Ex. 5870,7000,7005

shipping_type_for_matrixrates.label: Shipping Type for Matrix Rates
shipping_type_for_matrixrates.comment: This string must match with "delivery_type" column of Matrix Rates CSV
